alert.note: Alert for Jefferson; Wakulla (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Tornado Warning issued November 22 at 2:21AM EST until November 22 at 2:45AM EST by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Tornado Warning for... East central Wakulla County in Big Bend Florida... Southwestern Jefferson County in Big Bend Florida... * Until 245 AM EST. * At 221 AM EST, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located over St. Marks, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Tornado. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. * This dangerous storm will be near... St. Marks around 225 AM EST. Other locations impacted by this tornadic thunderstorm include Plum Orchard and Port Leon. TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN
info.instruction: TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris. Tornadoes are extremely difficult to see and confirm at night. Do not wait to see or hear the tornado. TAKE COVER NOW!
